title: .net developer backend api development
description: We are looking for a Senior .NET Backend Developer to test and help in developing a .NET CORE API that integrates with a filing API. The API will handle the filing of eviction cases, document uploads, fee submissions, and notifications from the E-Filing Manager (EFM). The project includes database integration with MS SQL Server for retrieving case data in XML format. The developer will be responsible for writing relevant code for the API is secure, performant, scalable, and follows best practices for error handling, logging, and documentation. How fast you need it delivered: The project timeline is aggressive, and we need the API to be developed within 1 week. We already have an implementation with required libraries and development environment ready with a v0 version of the API code in a github repo. The developer will be added to the repo and be given the dev environment or any tools required including AI tools. They should be able to work efficiently and meet the deadlines for each task outlined in the project timeline. The developer will work independently on the development of the API but will collaborate closely with our team to gather requirements, provide progress updates, and address any issues or concerns. Regular communication and coordination with the team are essential for the success of the project. If there's potential for more work: Depending on the success of this project and the quality of work delivered, there may be potential for ongoing maintenance, enhancements, and additional features for the Eviction Case Filing API. We are looking to establish a long-term partnership with a skilled developer who can contribute to the growth and improvement of our API. What you don't understand about the job and how they can help: If there are any aspects of the project requirements or specifications that are unclear or need further clarification, please feel free to ask questions. We value open communication and want to ensure that the developer has a clear understanding of the project scope and expectations. If you have any suggestions or recommendations based on your expertise and experience, we welcome your input to help improve the API development process. Required experience: - 5+ years of experience in .NET backend development. - Strong proficiency in C#, ASP.NET Core, and Web API development. - Expertise in designing and developing RESTful APIs. - Experience with SOAP-based web services and XML data handling. - Familiarity with Azure API Management service. - Knowledge of database integration, particularly with MS SQL Server. - Understanding of security best practices, including HTTPS, TLS, and certificate-based authentication. - Experience with implementing Swagger UI for API documentation. - Proficient in writing unit tests and ensuring code quality. Helpful links and references to explain the desired style: - [ASP.NET Core Web API documentation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/aspnet/core/web-api/) - [Azure API Management documentation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/api-management/) - [Swagger UI documentation](https://swagger.io/docs/open-source-tools/swagger-ui/usage/installation/) - [Best practices for ASP.NET Core Web API](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/aspnet/core/web-api/advanced/best-practices) - [Serilog logging library](https://serilog.net/) - [SoapCore library for SOAP support in ASP.NET Core](https://github.com/DigDes/SoapCore) We highly value the effort and consideration that freelancers put into their proposals. We have provided detailed information about the project requirements, timeline, and expectations to help you understand the scope of the work. If you have any questions or need further clarification, please don't hesitate to reach out. We are excited to review your proposal and potentially work with you on this project.
